basics.name: Ahad Jawaid
basics.label: Graduate Researcher
basics.summary: A developer and research who likes to build cool things :)

work.name: Institute for Advanced Study, Princeton University
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

awards.title: Undergraduate Research Award
awards.awarder: Erik Jonsson School of Engineering & Computer Science

awards.title: Best Use of AI in Education
1st in the Patient Safety Technology Challenge

publications.name: Style Mixture of Experts for Expressive Text-To-Speech Synthesis
publications.summary: StyleMoE is an approach that divides the embedding space, modeled by the style encoder, into tractable subsets handled by style experts.
